name: GooTracking for WooCommerce
author: Gooplus.fr

sections.description:
GooTracking is a plugin that corresponds to the C2B situation where clients need to send a parcel to a business, like repairers. It makes the experience easier for the customer and allows the repairer to send quotes, information and can manage online payments.

Introduction

Gootracking plugin provides all shipping and client management in one plugin. It allows you to manage all customers exchanges and communications. Print shipment labels of any delivery method of your choice (UPS, DHL, Personal…), insert client label in the parcel, then scan its QR code to get all client data in your interface, send quotes and be paid online through your website. Now you can expand your business everywhere.

Integrates GooTracking

Once this plugin is installed and configured with necessary information (please visit installation section for more info), your WordPress/WooCommerce website will be ready to make you save time and expand your customer base. You’ll be able to manage most of your clients exchanges with GooTracking

Receive parcels from your clients, do your job and send it back

Your customer choose from your website the shipping method he likes, pays online. You receive the parcell and scan the label in it to integrate it in your database. Edit quotes in the plugin, your customer validate it and pays online. Proceed on the hardware and send it back through still through the GooTracking interface

Workflow:

  • A customer wants to send an item to your business.
  • Your customer chooses the transporter. (UPS, TNT, ..)
  • The plugin generates a label (UPS labels, Kiala labels, etc…) to be glued on to the parcel
  • Another label is generated with a tracking QR code that is to be put inside the parcel
  • Your customer can payonline for the transport
  • You will receive the item thanks to the transporter that the user chose
  • You scan the QR code
  • You get all the information about the customer and his needs in your back office
  • Your customer will be informed of the status of the repairs and will receive live updates
  • You will be able to send a quote to your customer. (e.g price of repairs)
  • Your customer will accept or decline the quote.
  • Your customer will pay online if he accepts
  • You can send back the item to the customer once repaired (again with full automatic label generation)

The plugin is perfect for businesses that want to expand their customer base and search for new opportunities. You can test a demo on our website or watch our video : gootracking.gooplus.fr (english version).

The plugins generate UPS labels, Kiala Labels and personal labels. Those labels are used to ship parcel to your company.

Demo: http://gootracking.gooplus.fr/

This service has been created by the company gooplus: www.gooplus.fr
sections.installation: Log in to your WordPress dashboard. Go to “Plugins -> Add New” Go to “Upload Plugin”. Seacrh for the zip file Click to “Install Now” when you find the plugin. Activate the plugin by clicking “Activate”. Check if WooCommerce is installed before activating this plugin. Add shortcode [GooTracking] in a post or a Page. For each shipping method, create a WooCommerce product and add ID of this product in GooTrackingShip Settings. Populate all shipping credentials given by the provider selected.
